overview_of_class: The course examines the development and marketing of popular culture from the product development stage to public distribution. Students form production companies that pitch, develop, market, promote, and advertise a television based comedy or dramatic program. The emphasis in the class is both to understand and manage the business and talent sides of popular culture. Students are evaluated on team projects and a take home midterm.
name: Development & Marketing Popular Culture
subject: COMM_ST
